text: @realDonaldTrump Record growth of what? The stock market (fueled by massive injections from the Fed), Biden's poll numbers, unemployment, Covid19 cases & deaths or civil disorder? Our country is in a mess & you think a fed-fueled DJ Index is the only measure that matters. #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica
